inclusion.criterion: known history of Sickle cell disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: positive history of sickle cell crises since childhood
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: afebrile within the normal blood pressure
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no splenomegaly detected in physical exam
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no positive history of drug allergy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: won't smoke or uses any illicit drugs
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: lab study results: Hgb 8 g/dl, WBC 10000 /mm3, Plt 300000 /ml, MCV 106 fL, Hemoglobine electrophoresis 91% HbS 6%HbF 3%HbA2
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a known history of Sickle cell disease and is experiencing severe bone pain. They have undergone treatment with intra venous pain modulators, but the results are not specified.
